verses.verse: וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-Sa went on יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Then Jacob רַגְלָ֑יו <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lav; his journey וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech and came אַ֥רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah into the land בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- of the people קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> Ke-dem. of the east

וַיַּ֞רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar And he looked וְהִנֵּ֧ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold בְאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> ve-'Er and behold a well בַּשָּׂדֶ֗ה <S%H7704><s%> bas-sa-Deh, in the field וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and behold שָׁ֞ם <S%H8033><s%> sham there שְׁלֹשָׁ֤ה <S%H7969><s%> she-lo-Shah and lo there [were] three עֶדְרֵי־ <S%H5739><s%> 'ed-rei- flocks צֹאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> tzoN of sheep רֹבְצִ֣ים <S%H7257><s%> roe-Tzim lying עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-ha, beside כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- that הַבְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> hab-be-'Er by it for out of that well הַהִ֔וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv, they יַשְׁק֖וּ <S%H8248><s%> yash-Ku they watered הָעֲדָרִ֑ים <S%H5739><s%> ha-'a-da-Rim; the flocks וְהָאֶ֥בֶן <S%H68><s%> ve-ha-'E-ven stone גְּדֹלָ֖ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah and a great עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> pi mouth הַבְּאֵֽר׃ <S%H875><s%> hab-be-'Er. [was] upon the well's

וְנֶאֶסְפוּ־ <S%H622><s%> ve-ne-'es-fu- gathered שָׁ֣מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah there כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הָעֲדָרִ֗ים <S%H5739><s%> ha-'a-da-Rim, And thither were all the flocks וְגָלֲל֤וּ <S%H1556><s%> ve-ga-la-Lu and they rolled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <S%H68><s%> ha-'E-ven the stone מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> pi mouth הַבְּאֵ֔ר <S%H875><s%> hab-be-'Er, from the well's וְהִשְׁק֖וּ <S%H8248><s%> ve-hish-Ku and watered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַצֹּ֑אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon; the sheep וְהֵשִׁ֧יבוּ <S%H7725><s%> ve-he-Shi-vu again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֶ֛בֶן <S%H68><s%> ha-'E-ven the stone עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on פִּ֥י <S%H6310><s%> pi mouth הַבְּאֵ֖ר <S%H875><s%> hab-be-'Er upon the well's לִמְקֹמָֽהּ׃ <S%H4725><s%> lim-ko-Mah. in his place

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לָהֶם֙ la-Hem יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, And Jacob אַחַ֖י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chai unto them My brethren מֵאַ֣יִן <S%H370><s%> me-'A-yin whence אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem; and they וַיֹּ֣אמְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-me-Ru, [be] ye;And they said מֵחָרָ֖ן <S%H2771><s%> me-cha-Ran Of Haran אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> 'a-Na-che-nu. we

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לָהֶ֔ם la-Hem, הַיְדַעְתֶּ֖ם <S%H3045><s%> hay-da'-Tem unto them Know אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לָבָ֣ן <S%H3837><s%> la-Van ye Laban בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son נָח֑וֹר <S%H5152><s%> na-Chor; Nahor וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said יָדָֽעְנוּ׃ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da-'e-nu. We know

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem הֲשָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> ha-sha-Lom [He is] well ל֑וֹ lo; וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru said שָׁל֔וֹם <S%H7965><s%> sha-Lom, is well וְהִנֵּה֙ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and here רָחֵ֣ל <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel and behold Rachel בִּתּ֔וֹ <S%H1323><s%> bit-To, his daughter בָּאָ֖ה <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ah cometh עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon. with the sheep

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Lo עוֹד֙ <S%H5750><s%> 'Od is still הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom day גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, [it is] yet high לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- is not עֵ֖ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et neither [is it] time הֵאָסֵ֣ף <S%H622><s%> he-'a-Sef should be gathered together הַמִּקְנֶ֑ה <S%H4735><s%> ham-mik-Neh; that the cattle הַשְׁק֥וּ <S%H8248><s%> hash-Ku water הַצֹּ֖אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon ye the sheep וּלְכ֥וּ <S%H1980><s%> u-le-Chu and go רְעֽוּ׃ <S%H7462><s%> re-'U. [and] feed

וַיֹּאמְרוּ֮ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru And they said לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo not נוּכַל֒ <S%H3201><s%> nu-Chal We cannot עַ֣ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after יֵאָֽסְפוּ֙ <S%H622><s%> ye-'a-se-Fu be gathered together כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָ֣עֲדָרִ֔ים <S%H5739><s%> ha-'a-da-Rim, until all the flocks וְגָֽלֲלוּ֙ <S%H1556><s%> ve-ga-la-Lu and [till] they roll אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֶ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> ha-'E-ven, the stone מֵעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> pi mouth הַבְּאֵ֑ר <S%H875><s%> hab-be-'Er; from the well's וְהִשְׁקִ֖ינוּ <S%H8248><s%> ve-hish-Ki-nu then we water הַצֹּֽאן׃ <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon. the sheep

עוֹדֶ֖נּוּ <S%H5750><s%> o-Den-nu And while he yet מְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> me-dab-Ber spake עִמָּ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im-Mam; them וְרָחֵ֣ל׀ <S%H7354><s%> ve-ra-Chel with them Rachel בָּ֗אָה <S%H935><s%> Ba-'ah, came עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> 'im- with הַצֹּאן֙ <S%H6629><s%> hatz-tzoN sheep אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לְאָבִ֔יהָ <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Vi-ha, with her father's כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for רֹעָ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> ro-'Ah for she kept them הִֽוא׃ <S%H1931><s%> hi he

וַיְהִ֡י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after רָאָ֨ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'Ah saw יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And it came to pass when Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רָחֵ֗ל <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel, Rachel בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter לָבָן֙ <S%H3837><s%> la-Van of Laban אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, his mother's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon and the sheep לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> la-Van of Laban אֲחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo; his mother's וַיִּגַּ֣שׁ <S%H5066><s%> vai-yig-Gash went near יַעֲקֹ֗ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, that Jacob וַיָּ֤גֶל <S%H1556><s%> vai-Ya-gel and rolled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָאֶ֙בֶן֙ <S%H68><s%> ha-'E-ven the stone מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from פִּ֣י <S%H6310><s%> pi mouth הַבְּאֵ֔ר <S%H875><s%> hab-be-'Er, from the well's וַיַּ֕שְׁקְ <S%H8248><s%> vai-Yashk and watered אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צֹ֥אן <S%H6629><s%> tzon the flock לָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> la-Van of Laban אֲחִ֥י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother אִמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo. his mother's

וַיִּשַּׁ֥ק <S%H5401><s%> vai-yish-Shak kissed יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob לְרָחֵ֑ל <S%H7354><s%> le-ra-Chel; Rachel וַיִּשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> vai-yis-Sa and lifted up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- קֹל֖וֹ <S%H6963><s%> ko-Lo his voice וַיֵּֽבְךְּ׃ <S%H1058><s%> vai-Ye-vek. and wept

וַיַּגֵּ֨ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged told יַעֲקֹ֜ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob לְרָחֵ֗ל <S%H7354><s%> le-ra-Chel, Rachel כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֲחִ֤י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi brother אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi-ha that he [was] her father's ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu, he וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ve-Chi for בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- son רִבְקָ֖ה <S%H7259><s%> riv-Kah and that he [was] Rebekah's ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; and she וַתָּ֖רָץ <S%H7323><s%> vat-Ta-rotz and she ran וַתַּגֵּ֥ד <S%H5046><s%> vat-tag-Ged and told לְאָבִֽיהָ׃ <S%H1><s%> le-'a-Vi-ha. her father

וַיְהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <S%H8085><s%> chish-Mo-a' heard לָבָ֜ן <S%H3837><s%> la-Van And it came to pass when Laban אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֣מַע׀ <S%H8088><s%> She-ma' the tidings יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son אֲחֹת֗וֹ <S%H269><s%> a-cho-To, his sister's וַיָּ֤רָץ <S%H7323><s%> vai-Ya-rotz that he ran לִקְרָאתוֹ֙ <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-To to meet וַיְחַבֶּק־ <S%H2263><s%> vay-chab-bek- him and embraced לוֹ֙ lo וַיְנַשֶּׁק־ <S%H5401><s%> vay-nash-shek- him and kissed ל֔וֹ lo, וַיְבִיאֵ֖הוּ <S%H935><s%> vay-vi-'E-hu him and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To; him to his house וַיְסַפֵּ֣ר <S%H5608><s%> vay-sap-Per And he told לְלָבָ֔ן <S%H3837><s%> le-la-Van, Laban אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> had-de-va-Rim all these things הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh. these

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לוֹ֙ lo לָבָ֔ן <S%H3837><s%> la-Van, And Laban אַ֛ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach to him Surely עַצְמִ֥י <S%H6106><s%> 'atz-Mi thou [art] my bone וּבְשָׂרִ֖י <S%H1320><s%> u-ve-sa-Ri and my flesh אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; and he וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev And he abode עִמּ֖וֹ <S%H5973><s%> im-Mo with חֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> Cho-desh of a month יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim. with him the space

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לָבָן֙ <S%H3837><s%> la-Van And Laban לְיַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> le-ya-'a-Ko, unto Jacob הֲכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> ha-chi- Because אָחִ֣י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi Because thou [art] my brother אַ֔תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah, you וַעֲבַדְתַּ֖נִי <S%H5647><s%> va-'a-vad-Ta-ni shouldest thou therefore serve חִנָּ֑ם <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam; free הַגִּ֥ידָה <S%H5046><s%> hag-Gi-dah bewray לִּ֖י li מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what מַּשְׂכֻּרְתֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H4909><s%> mas-kur-Te-cha. me what [shall] thy wages

וּלְלָבָ֖ן <S%H3837><s%> u-le-la-Van And Laban שְׁתֵּ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Tei had two בָנ֑וֹת <S%H1323><s%> va-Not; daughters שֵׁ֤ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name הַגְּדֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah of the elder לֵאָ֔ה <S%H3812><s%> le-'Ah, [was] Leah וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem and the name הַקְּטַנָּ֖ה <S%H6996><s%> hak-ke-tan-Nah of the younger רָחֵֽל׃ <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel. [was] Rachel

וְעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> ve-'ei-Nei eyed לֵאָ֖ה <S%H3812><s%> le-'Ah Leah רַכּ֑וֹת <S%H7390><s%> rak-Kot; [was] tender וְרָחֵל֙ <S%H7354><s%> ve-ra-Chel but Rachel הָֽיְתָ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-ye-Tah, become יְפַת־ <S%H3303><s%> ye-fat- and well תֹּ֖אַר <S%H8389><s%> To-'ar of form וִיפַ֥ת <S%H3303><s%> vi-Fat was beautiful מַרְאֶֽה׃ <S%H4758><s%> mar-'Eh. favoured

וַיֶּאֱהַ֥ב <S%H157><s%> vai-ye-'e-Hav loved יַעֲקֹ֖ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko And Jacob אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רָחֵ֑ל <S%H7354><s%> ra-Chel; Rachel וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said אֶֽעֱבָדְךָ֙ <S%H5647><s%> 'e-'e-va-de-Cha I will serve שֶׁ֣בַע <S%H7651><s%> She-va' thee seven שָׁנִ֔ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim, years בְּרָחֵ֥ל <S%H7354><s%> be-ra-Chel for Rachel בִּתְּךָ֖ <S%H1323><s%> bit-te-Cha daughter הַקְּטַנָּֽה׃ <S%H6996><s%> hak-ke-tan-Nah. thy younger

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לָבָ֗ן <S%H3837><s%> la-Van, And Laban ט֚וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov [It is] better תִּתִּ֣י <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ti that I give אֹתָ֣הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah לָ֔ךְ Lach, מִתִּתִּ֥י <S%H5414><s%> mit-tit-Ti her to thee than that I should give אֹתָ֖הּ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tah לְאִ֣ישׁ <S%H582><s%> le-'Ish her to אַחֵ֑ר <S%H312><s%> 'a-Cher; her to another שְׁבָ֖ה <S%H3427><s%> she-Vah abide עִמָּדִֽי׃ <S%H5978><s%> 'im-ma-Di. against
